/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their balconies add a touch of architectural interest. The trees, lush and green, provide a natural contrast to the urban landscape. A few bicycles are parked on the sidewalk, hinting at the preferred mode of transportation in this city. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
